mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff(first_name, last_name, address_id, picture, email, store_id, username, password, active) VALUES( #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{addressId}, #{picture}, #{email}, #{storeId}, #{username}, #{password}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT s.staff_id staffId, s.email email, CONCAT(s.first_name,' ', s.last_name) name, a.phone phone, a.district district, a.address address, s.picture picture, s.active active, s.store_id storeId FROM staff s, address a WHERE s.address_id = a.address_id AND s.staff_id = #{staffId}
SELECT staff_id staffId, email email, username FROM staff WHERE email = #{email} AND password = PASSWORD(#{password})
